message: 'apikey' provided in the token is empty or invalid, please verify it on the dashboard.
'token' is empty or invalid or might have expired.
'meetingId' is empty or invalid, please verify it or generate new meetingId using the API.
'participantId' is empty or invalid, it shouldn't contain any whitespaces.
Leaving meeting, since this 'participantId' joined from another device.
It seems your account is deactivated by VideoSDK for some reason, you can reach out to us at support@videosdk.live.
'permissions' provided in the token are invalid, please don't use 'allow_join' or 'allow_mod' with 'ask_join'.
You have reached max partcipant limit in a meeting.
You have reached max speaker limit in a meeting.
Recording start request failed due to an unknown error.
Recording stop request failed due to an unknown error.
Livestream start request failed due to an unknown error.
Livestream stop request failed due to an unknown error.
Livestream 'outputs' configuration provided was invalid.
HLS start request failed due to an unknown error.
HLS stop request failed due to an unknown error.
Previous recording session is being processed, please try again after few seconds!
Previous RTMP recording session is being processed, please try again after few seconds!
Previous HLS streaming session is being processed, please try again after few seconds!
Recording stopped due to an unknown error.
Livestream stopped due to an unknown error.
HLS stopped due to an unknown error.
Your browser/Device does not support Video.
Your browser/Device does not support Audio.
Your browser/Device does not support  Screen Sharing.
Video capture permission denied.
Audio capture permission denied.
Screen sharing permission denied.
The provided custom video track is invalid; reverting to the default video track. Please ensure that the video track meets the required specifications.
The provided custom audio track is invalid; reverting to the default audio track. Please ensure that the audio track meets the required specifications.
The provided custom video track is in an ended state. Please verify the video track's status, and try again.
The provided custom audio track is in an ended state. Please verify the audio track's status, and try again.
Oops! Something went wrong. The room was in a connecting state, and during that time, an action encountered an issue. Please try again after joining a meeting.
Oops! It seems like camera access was denied or dismissed. To proceed, kindly grant access through your App settings.
Please ensure your camera is connected and turned on
Oops! It seems like mic access was denied or dismissed. To proceed, kindly grant access through your App settings.
Please ensure your mic is connected and turned on
Camera access unavailable: Please ensure your device is compatible.
Microphone access unavailable: Please ensure your device is compatible.
Camera track has ended. Please make sure your camera is turned on or try restarting it.
Microphone track has ended or the microphone is disconnected. Please check your microphone connection and try again.
